attributes.action: Influence the Commonwealth Countries,EU and USA & the rest of the world
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
through the Foreign Secretarie's Office to bring about change to promote democracy in Uganda. Museveni may be seen as a hero to the rest of the world but he is oppresing the people of Uganda through his dictatorship and denial of freedom of the press and indeed of that of the individual citizen in Uganda.
He has now under the guise of State House blocked the publication of the Indepenent paper that was due to be launched by Andrew Mwenda his number one critic.The Prime Minister has just been to Uganda and must agree that the ordinary man in the street and in the village needs to be informed and not manipulated by the state. one man is dictating the destiny of Uganda and not even the Parliament has any say in important  matters of the state.we need support to be able to circulate information to the ordinary people and not rely on state propaganda alone.
